Projects.title: Exoria Data Store
desc: An e-commerce platform specializing in website template marketplace, built with a focus on user experience and secure transactions.
Features include responsive design using Bootstrap, integrated payment gateway for secure transactions, and optimized product listing management.

Projects.title: DiaCare
desc: A comprehensive healthcare platform focused on diabetes prediction and management.
Built using Laravel and Flask frameworks, the platform leverages reliable medical datasets to provide accurate health insights and predictions.

Projects.title: SchEdu
desc: A sophisticated Virtual Learning Environment that revolutionizes online education through modern web technologies.
Features include interactive quizzes, comprehensive progress tracking, and an innovative level-based learning system built with Next.js, Prisma, and NextAuth.

Projects.title: RumahSaladFaqiha
desc: A tailored e-commerce solution designed specifically for a local MSME partner in the food industry.
Built with Laravel, the platform streamlines product sales and payment management in a localized market context.

Projects.title: JelajahNusantara
desc: An immersive educational platform celebrating Indonesian cultural heritage.
Developed with Laravel, featuring interactive elements and rich content delivery for an engaging user experience in cultural learning.

Projects.title: PromptWorld
desc: A specialized platform for GPT prompt management and sharing.
Implements advanced features including intuitive search functionality, systematic prompt categorization, and secure user authentication for personalized experiences.

Projects.title: CryCast
desc: An advanced cryptocurrency price prediction platform utilizing machine learning technology.
Implements the Naive Bayes algorithm for accurate price forecasting and market analysis.

Projects.title: NeuRehab
desc: An innovative post-stroke rehabilitation system combining mobile technology with IoT capabilities.
Features real-time vital signs monitoring through integrated IoT sensors (Arduino Nano, ESP32) and a Kotlin-based mobile application.

Projects.title: MotherApp
desc: A comprehensive pregnancy exercise monitoring system with both backend and mobile components.
Features include secure REST API endpoints, real-time exercise tracking, and pregnancy-specific calorie calculations, implemented with Laravel backend and Flutter frontend.

Projects.title: Denkmeister
desc: An offline-first German language learning application designed for mobile users.
Built with Flutter, featuring comprehensive learning tools including vocabulary exercises, grammar lessons, and pronunciation practice, all functioning without internet connectivity.
